io.elegie.luchess.core.api

Interface ServicesFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServicesFactoryImpl

    public interface ServicesFactory
    The factory is the entry point used to obtain references to all services. Implementations are free to provide any indexing mechanism they like, such as a search technology, a relational database, as long as they respect the API defined for each service.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BuilderService getBuilderService() 
      ExplorerService getExplorerService() 
      IndexInfoService getIndexInfoService() 
      void initialize(java.util.Properties parameters)
      Any client creating a factory should call the initialize method right after the factory has been created.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(java.util.Properties parameters)
        Any client creating a factory should call the initialize method right after the factory has been created.
        Parameters:
        parameters - List of parameters to be transmitted to the underlying implementation. It is up to the implementation to make sure that all necessary configurations are made available to services.

      • getBuilderService

        BuilderService getBuilderService()
        Returns:
        The Builder Service.

      • getExplorerService

        ExplorerService getExplorerService()
        Returns:
        The Explorer Service.

        Returns:
        The Info Service.
